data.prayer: Father, we suspect there is 1 believer for every 13 neighbors who are far from you in Rocha. Please, give courage and opportunity to your children to speak boldly.
data.verse: Pray also for me, that whenever I speak, words may be given me so that I will fearlessly make known the mystery of the gospel.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Rocha, Uruguay
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Jesus, teach the local leaders in Rocha, Uruguay to be humble and to serve others.
data.verse: It shall not be so among you. But whoever would be great among you must be your servant, and whoever would be first among you must be your slave, even as the Son of Man came not to be served but to serve, and to give his life as a ransom for many.

data.section_summary: On average, 9 babies will be born in the next 100 hours to families who are far from God in Rocha, Uruguay.
data.prayer: Lord, reveal yourself to these new families.
Father, you said, "The earth belongs to Me and all that is in it". Please, call Rocha, Uruguay into obedience and eternal life.
data.verse: The earth is Yahweh’s, with its fullness; the world, and those who dwell therein.

data.prayer: Father, send out evangelists who will challenge people like Peter who said, "Repent and be baptized, every one of you" in the state of Rocha, Uruguay.
data.verse: Peter replied, “Repent and be baptized, every one of you, in the name of Jesus Christ for the forgiveness of your sins. And you will receive the gift of the Holy Spirit.

data.focus_label: Pray for the city of Rocha
data.prayer: Pray that God raises up new churches in the city of Rocha, Rocha, Uruguay.
Spirit, give the disciples of the the state of Rocha words, actions, signs and wonders to proclaim the coming of the Kingdom.
data.verse: As you go, proclaim this message: "The kingdom of heaven has come near."

data.prayer: Jesus, please give the apostles in Rocha, Uruguay a vision for the harvest, and a passion to see the gospel spread to every corner of the the state.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Jesus, help the church in the state of Rocha to not rely on buildings or programs, but on your Spirit and the simple faithfulness of every believer.
